name: Assemble Race
description:
It's time to unleash your building skills and create the ultimate robot to claim victory!

Turn your bot into the ultimate climbing, running, jumping and crawling machine to tackle obstacles you will be facing on your way to the finish line.

Assemble and collect the parts you need along you route and create the ultimate super bot for the situation at hand.

Do you have what it takes to beat the best and finish first?

Assemble Race features:
- Collect parts
- Assemble your creation
- Build the ultimate bot
- Race to the finish
- Become the best
